body_html: If TensorFlow on OpenCL would help you in your work let me know, to the extent I can help advance research and practice of deep learning I'd like to help. My company has built an OpenCL back end for TensorFlow tuned for a variety of GPUs as part of our work in on-device inference. We have tested on the major mobile & desktop GPU families including common configurations on Windows & Mac. If there's enough interest we may do some kind of public distribution. We also have Metal (Apple GPU) and LLVM (CPU), along with a way to do zero-dependency deployment. The idea here being to give every device great support for deep learning.
